short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A private space to collect and share the things you love. Built for families; includes parental controls and curated content.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Create a safe place for your family to explore the web together.

* Parental Control * 
Limit your childrenâ€™s web access to only the content you approve by blocking access to websites outside your childâ€™s library.

* Youtube for the Family *
Give your children access to ðŸŽ‰ Youtube ðŸŽ‰ videos or entire channels without the distracting and often inappropriate recommendations or comments.

* Private Social Network * 
A mini private social network just for you and your family.

* Encrypted and Secure
We support client-side encryption for your Kindred data.  Without your password, no one can read your data - not even us.

* Custom New Tab/Home Page *
Replaces the new tab page with an easy to navigate library of content just for them. Search engines are not great for young kids.  Our new tab lets users search or navigate their library without typing.

* Quick sharing * 
Share and give access to content with just one action. Give a child access to content simply by adding it to one of the collections in their library.

* Explore *
Find new content right for you. Explore and subscribe to content published by other users or your friends.
